imageprocessing

Class ConnectedComponentImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • imageprocessing.ConnectedComponentImage

  • public class ConnectedComponentImage
extends java.lang.Object
    Compilation: javac ConnectedComponentImage.java The ConnectedComponentImage class

    This class takes in an image using its file location and manipulates the image to produce different results

    Author:
    Stephen Walsh
